snippet: Filippo Grandi, head of the United Nations Relief and Works Agency, predicted that by the end of 2013, the flow of refugees would swamp humanitarian resources.
lead_paragraph: Filippo Grandi, head of the United Nations Relief and Works Agency, predicted that by the end of 2013, the flow of refugees would swamp humanitarian resources.
